pages.text: $(li)The Shulker Box is the better version of the Sack.$(br)$(li)This one doesn't add the slow effect when you are carrying with a few of them.
$(li)To access to its inventory, just place the Shulker Box and open it right clicking, like a Chest.

$(li)Then you can break it with your mere hand or other tools to return it to your inventory.$(br)$(li)Shulker Box can be enchanted with Siphon and Refill enchantings.$(br)$(li)Shulkerbox can be tinted with Dyes in a Crafting Table.
